About

Discrete notes is a blog about discrete maths and theoretical computer science, which are my research interests.

A similar blog in French is Des notes discretes. Some posts are translations, but not the majority. Before these blogs I used to write on Semidoc, the blog of the PhD students of IRIF.

There is no comment section, but you can send me emails, and Iâ€™ll be happy to answer.
